Html:
I was comparing a 51/10/0 spec to a 53/3/0+x spec and noticed that as the 51/10/0 got to heroism/bloodlust time it switched from FB/Abar to straight Fireball spam while the 53/3/0+x switched from AB/Abar to AB2/Abar.

While I'm not certain, it occurs to me that FB2/Abar, like AB2/Abar, should be a better alternative than straight Fireballing since Abar is higher dps than Fireball. Though since that cycle isn't in Rawr.Mage atm I can't test it. Is there a way to add this cycle short of editing the source directly?
It can only be done in source, I'll try to add it in soonish.
